themes: attendance as a metric for funding
impact of funding relative to organization size
key_phrases: look at what each individual group is accomplishing
How effective are they at using the HOT funds provided
How many people are actually attending productions
30k to a 100k org is very impactful. 30k to a 500k org not so much
barriers_identified: current funding amounts are not impactful for larger organizations
solutions_proposed: evaluate each group based on accomplishments and reach
assess effectiveness of HOT funds usage
consider actual attendance in funding decisions
scale funding impact relative to organization size
